Collector's Album -Limited Edition
STEREO SL-6687
SEASON'S GREETINGS
from
AmericanAirlines
Hark, The Herald Angels Sing!
It's the Christmas season once again, the most inspiring,
the most meaninetu time or the vear.
O Come All Ye Faithful!
It is a time for families to gather, for friends to assemble.
It is a time for worship, a period of holiness. And more than
any other time the yuletide is a time for a very special kind
of music.
This edition of "SEASON'S GREETINGS" tastefully combines
the reverent and dignined traditional melodies or the season
with the jovous, contemporarv songs, and each selection 1s
performed by the most gifted and popular artists on record.
Superbly recorded in stereophonic sound, "SEASON'S GREETINGS"
provides just the right holiday spirit.
Have a merry, merry!!

properties.sfomuseum:description: Phonograph record promoting American Airlines, titled “Season’s greetings”; produced by Capitol Records;a. record cover in plastic sleeve; color photographic detail image of red poinsettia and text,  black and white illustration of a Christmas tree and Santa Claus with children and description of music on reverse;b. LP record with pink and silver center border center;c. white paper sleeve with rounded corners.
